name: .EOP File Extension
summary: Learn about .EOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an EOP file in Everyone Piano (Windows) and related software, such as EOP Sheet Music. To open an EOP file in Everyone Piano, select File â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your EOP file.
